IntroConvoAlmaXanthe: ^Xanthe, tell me, can you sense it?
^Yes, the woods have begun to moan. I fear the Life Oak is in trouble.
^Indeed. The sun has left its canopy, the Life Oak is dying and if it does the woods will die along with it.
^Is there a way to save the tree?
^You must journey to the top of the Life Oak and call back the sun. The risks are great, the tree will try to siphon your life force to sustain its own. You will not have much time.
^Very well. Seek out the three sages, Syl, Luna, and Oran. They dwell within the Life Oak and hold powerful dryad elixirs that will aid you on your quest.
